OOC: Orchid are all of your characters traitorous?

::Aerotaur/Terrataur::
       Aerotaur grabs his staff and uses it to intercept the spear.  He then 
slashes across Papertron's chest.

       Terrataur looks around.  "Uhh...  This can't be good."  She opens a 
com to everyone in the vicinity of the ship.  "All bots that hear this come 
to my location.  There are two bots attacking Aerotaur and Nightlight.  I 
think one's name was Birdbot."  She raises her drill arms and fires a shot at 
Papertron and a shot at Birdbot.

--part1_f8.e53729c.28af3899_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
